line.comment: * Added (Nicoman35): Drones for all ships (missile interception, assault support)

* Added (Nicoman35): Ignored this fucking [SIGNAL_REQUESTUNDOCK] calling !ship.signal.requestundock. Every time some AI ship is docking at a pirate station, this signal is fired, leading to temporary not available fighters for the base
* LU (Solarahawk): Corrected rnd number generation. When using $size of array, $size is 1-based and needs to be decremented.
* Add two missile types, free cargo space is filled up: Missile boats 60% - 80%, all other ships 10-16%
* Add drones (max 25% of remaining free space, or max 80 drones)

sval.val: Added (Nicoman35): Drones for all ships (missile interception, assault support)

Added (Nicoman35): Ignored this fucking [SIGNAL_REQUESTUNDOCK] calling !ship.signal.requestundock. Every time some AI ship is docking at a pirate station, this signal is fired, leading to temporary not available fighters for the base
LU (Solarahawk): Corrected rnd number generation. When using $size of array, $size is 1-based and needs to be decremented.
Add two missile types, free cargo space is filled up: Missile boats 60% - 80%, all other ships 10-16%
Add drones (max 25% of remaining free space, or max 80 drones)
